Ok updating since someone told me too.. haha and 'cause its been over a month since i did

what to update about tho? hmm.. lol

Got braces, 2 days ago, they dont really hurt anymore so thats cool.. lol

Christmas was AWESOME!!! The snow was a TON of fun, we built a foot tall snowman, that was great :)

Hmm.. though whoever asked me to update this thing should just go to my xanga site (http://www.xanga.com/home.aspx?user=ashleyannaka) I update that thing a lot.. lol anywho..

i'll put the survey i put on there on here lol

1. Who are you? 
2. Are we friends? 
3. When and how did we meet?
4. Do you have a crush on me?
5. Would you kiss me?  
6. Give me a nickname and explain why you picked it. 
7. Describe me in one word. 
8. What was your first impression? 
9. Do you still think that way about me now?
10. What reminds you of me? 
11. If you could give me anything  
12. How well do you know me?  
13. When's the last time you saw me? 
14. Ever wanted to tell me something but couldn't? 
15. Are you going to put this on your blog and see what I say about you?




well thats it for now.. talk to ya laterz...~Ash
http://ashleyannaka.livejournal.com/3639.html

ok wow havent updated in.. FOREVER. thought I would since im incredibly bored.

lol though its pointless, but whatever

Two tests tommorow IM going to fail miserably, but whatever. lol

School is fine, jsut really slow. lol

Hey only 2 more days til Thanksgiving break! OH YEAH!!

ANd lauren (my sis) leaves for Four whole days tommorow!! Yesh!! :) hehehehe

I really dont have much else to write about.. so I guess thats mostly it..

Nothing much is really new.. Just read my xanga.. I update it waaaaaay more often.. lol anywho

~Ash
http://ashleyannaka.livejournal.com/3372.html

I need more creative titles, but oh well. Stuff works fine

Havent updated in what feels like forever, dont know how long ago it was tho, but who knows.. SO i though I'd update for my non-existant readers.. lol

So halloween is coming up. I think it'll be fun, but only for a few minutes, then it will go back to being boring. Tonight was supposed to be fun, but Jackie decided not to go Trick-or-Treating with me the night b4 halloween. Even tho on the radio lots of ppl said thye were goin the 30th.. oh well. We would ahve been  the only ppl on the street, but again oh well. lol

So im just goign to be sittin here doing nothing

TOmmorow, a party with a bunch of 40-50 yr olds.. fun, not. oh well

It might be interesting..

School is going ok i guess.. kinda.. eh

thats mostly it..

What are you doing/being for halloween?

if you read this.. you can respond.. haha

~Ash
http://ashleyannaka.livejournal.com/3174.html

Only updating because I dont want to do my homework writing in here delays it. Tho its pointless since im pretty sure no one reads this but oh well.

Those three tests i mentioned in my last entry. I got a 94 on one of em. The other two, I dont know. Read my xanga for what i thought of them.

Sorry about the last post, but its truly how i feel and how i have felt. I guess its gettin better, no its not. OH well. I guess it will. Gina is slowly becoming one of my best friends, shes the one I talk to most, well ont he phone. I talk to xen most on the net. 

Ok enough of all that. 

Friday was good. I loved the pep rally theme, its just funny seeing guys dressed like that. lol I love it when we have Algebra tests, we get to have C lunch, i  like C better than B.. I likethe people in B, its just i dont ever getta see my frnds that are in C lunch, and i see my friends that are in B lunch ALL the time.. So.. C is better.. lol :) 

Saturday (yesterday) didnt do much (read xanga about it)
today didnt do really anything, still delaying doing my english thing ive known about for 3 weeks thats due tommorow, i know shame on me. but oh well. I'll do it, eventually. lol

Wow my throat hurts, i dont know why. oh well..

I dont want to go to school tommorow, lately ive been dreading school, I havent really done that EVERYDAY like this since. well 5th grade, well maybe 6th, only 'cause i hated English and the teacher (she was nice, i just didnt like what she taught therefore i didnt like her lol) But since 6th im pretty sure I mostly liked school.

I dont know why, lately, ive been dreading going. I dont have any tests or anything tommorow. oh wait nvm i just figured out why.. Chemistry- i'll prob find out what i got on that test and what i hve in that class.. and.. Med health- the horribly hard test, that everyone failed that the teacher wont curve. greaaaaat.. oh well, and english, presenting this project thign, that i havent done, that i dont want to do, that is to write a poem, prose, fiction or non-fiction short story, or drama. OR you can do some sorda art.. 

ah.. both im not very good at.. 

well I think ive written enough stuff that no one is going to read or comment on, so relaly theres no pt in typing all this anyway.. so i'll just stop now

~Ash~
http://ashleyannaka.livejournal.com/2966.html

I feel like I annoy people...
No one looked at me funny or anything...
Its just.. I always seem to be the 3rd or 5th wheel.. 
Thats the bad part about starting life all over again.. (moving/changing schools-talkin about switching from private to public and moving back to houston from Sugar Land)

Ive noticed that more lately.. Everyone has their own lives that they sometimes try to include me in, but mostly.. They just want to hang out with those theyve known longer. It kinda.. I dont know.. 

I dont mind *THAT* much I suppose, but sometimes I wish I had what they had. A Best friend. One that I knew I could trust and hang out with all the time. Call at 4am. No matter what.

I had one at one time. WE've fallen apart now, We still talk, yes, but I feel like we no longer know eachother.

I had one before that, We also still talk, but we are TOTAL opposites now, so that is kinda well you can understand why that would be kinda weird.

I kinda hope no one will read this, I will probably be embarrassed or something about it later. Especially if you try to talk to me about this in person. I dont mind if you AIM, email or reply to this, just not in person, Unless i say so. 

I kinda wish I was back in middle school. 7th grade in particular. All my friends and I were together, we all were happy. LIfe was great then. :)

Or maybe.. ALl the way back to say 2nd grade. I was also happy then.

THings I woudlnt go back to.. 4th and 5th grade. those were the two worst years of my life in my 15.5 years of existence. 

I have no idea where I got all this from.. I dont know why I'm rambling on like this.

I feel liek typing and since to my knowledge, no one but dani, if she still reads this/if she did read this.. reads it. 

SO really theres no point except to type to myself. Ok now im talking to myself. I'll stop now

Life is actually ok right now, I dread school tommorow tho. 3 tests. I am afraid of my Chem grade. If i have a C im soo dead/grounded. Only because I lied and told my mom i was doing 'ok' in there, and didnt need help. THe truth is.. Im not doing 'ok' in there, and I do need help, well actually i dont, I understand how to do it, Its just i havent taken the time to memorize anything.. THats the whole class.. SO yeah.. NOT good

Well I guess I'll be quiet now. 

Even tho above I said I wished no one would read it, I really wish someone would comment/post whatever..

um.. Yeah. Tell me if you read it, tell me if you ever read it.. Please? Thanks.

Well enough of that.

HOw has your school year been going?

~Ash


ok well i do know why i feel like crying. Stupid PMS, but whatever.
http://ashleyannaka.livejournal.com/2569.html

Eh felt like updating. Though I dont have much to say, I say most of it in my xanga...

School is going ok I guess. I wish the weekend had been longer, oh well.

This weekend we might be going to Dallas, YAYNESS I love it there.. lol 

4 day weeked- Friday did nothing
             Saturday- did nothing; went to visit dad at hospital- read in xanga why
             Sunday- ASTROWORLD with Katie!! T'was FUN!
             Monday- not too much; went on an awesome bike ride with Lauren and Jackie :) (at the          umm..wherever the trail is.. lol along the Bayou..) So that was good, lots of excersise that Day beacuse earlier Jackie and I rode up and down Wycliffe.. We rode over 3 miles, 'cause the end both ways is 1.5 miles to the end and back to my house.. hehe.. :) T'was fun. Then the bike ride on the trail was.. umm.. from Bltway 8 to Dairy Ashford and back(on the trail though) dont know how far that is...but again was fun.. lol

Today- school, boring as usual.
       Karate- was fun, Father Thu (the main instructor-hes a catholic preist)wasnt there though.. oh well hehe
       After Karate- visited dad at hospital; came home did homework.. 

SO yeah, thats how my life has been in the past couple days, OH and PSAT tommorow, ick. oh well.

Anywho.. Tlak to you later (if anyone actually reads this, who knows maybe someone does.. lol)

~Ash
http://ashleyannaka.livejournal.com/2396.html

Well thought I should update.

Sunday- the karate thing, err bad.
They changed the whole schedule of what we were doing up, so we were REALLY REALLY confused, we looked like total idiots in front of over 100 people, got a bunch of compliments so I guess it wasnt as noticeable as I thought. lol

MOnday- school, not much

Tuesday- school, karate- was fun, wrote about that in xanga..

um. today- more school haha, was kinda boring, got a 91 on my Theatre thing, not too bad for not practicing AT ALL lol. Umm.. that was mostly it. lol

Well talk to you people later.

Dont know what I'm doing this weekend, I hope I can go to Astroworld w/ Katie, that would be.. FUN! heheh havent seen her since may, so that'll be cool

anywho.. well ttyl
~Ashley
http://ashleyannaka.livejournal.com/2079.html

Long week. Been a while since I updated so I thought I would.

Dont really remember all that happened this week, but you can read my xanga for that.. lol

Saturday- not sure what I'm doing. 

Sunday- Come see me at St. Cecilia's Ill be demonstrating karate! :) (its at 3..)

You know what I think its ptless to write n this thing, I dont think anyone reads it cept for maybe Dani.. lol

oh well..

adios. ttyl ~Ashley
http://ashleyannaka.livejournal.com/2028.html

Gah, why must I be so darn cranky? 
I hate this.
Everytime those two kids from down the street come over I get in a bad mood or pissed off at no one in particular. They annoy me to DEATH.
Thats not the only thing contributing to this bad mood.
I have horrible cramps. Make it go away. Make the cramps and the non-stop bleeding and everything else that comes with it just go away. 

Ok wow, I dont think Ive ever said stuff like that on the net before, It feels kinda good, to let it all loose. Let it all go! :)

Well I feel alot better now, still aching, still annoyed by anything to moves, but I'll get over it :)

HOpe you have a better day than I have. ~ash
http://ashleyannaka.livejournal.com/1645.html

I feel left out of things. I dont know why, I'm not left out, as far as I know. But I dont know. 

I wish I could drive. I hate having to be driven everywhere. It'd be nice to be able to drive myself somewhere, anywhere but stuck at home doing nothing.

Somewhere with friends I hardly see anymore. Somewhere exciting, somewhere but here.

Dont get me wrong, I like it here, but i hate being stuck doing absolutely nohting all weekend long, partially because I have no ride anywhere. My mom's new job, basically, requires her to work on weekends, She kinda has to if she wants to get enough people to participate in the thing she has to get them to do.

Oh well. 

Later I will probably get to go somewhere, I just hope my mom gets back before 6, well its 6 hours 'til then anyway, but I hope she does. 

Xenica's meeting thing is tonight at 6, so technically my mom hasta get back by 5:30, but whatever.

I also hope I can go to Xen's party tommorow as well, that will be fun :)!!

Well, I guess I'll write more some other time, adios mis amigos! ~Ashley
http://ashleyannaka.livejournal.com/1363.html

Well I wasnt going to update, but heck why not?

Now to decide what to update about. Hmm.. no one reads this, i dont think, maybe like one person, so really tehres no point, but eh whatever.. HAHA...

Bored, so if you read this, answer these questions, I doubt ppl who read this would know very many of these (well the ones that are really about me, such as when's my b-day?), but take a wild guess.. haha

1.What is my name? 
2.Where did we meet? (i might not even know that one, depending on who you are..)
3.How long have you known me?
4.When you first saw me, what your impression?
5.How old am I?
6.What is my birthday?
7.Do I watch football?
8.How many siblings do I have?
9.What animal do I remind you of? (that ones interesting- btw i got this survey thing off the net, i didnt make it up)
10.Am I shy or outgoing?
11.Am I a rebel or do I follow all the rules?
12.Can I sing?
13.Do I get along with my parents?
14.If there were one good nickname for me, what would it be? 
15.Am I right or left handed?
16.Do I make my bed in the mornings?
17.Am I a good friend?

Ok well, Im interested in seeing your answers, if you read this.. anyways..
Thats all for now :) 
~Ashley
http://ashleyannaka.livejournal.com/1197.html

Very bored, so I decided to update. 

Went to bed REALLY early, well 10 or so last night..

Got woken up around 10:40 'cause mom brought ova my medication (antibiotics for my tooth since i have an infection-thats why i had to have the root canal)

So had to take that, Dad woke me up at 6!!!! gosh, why couldnt he just wait til i woke up on my own, anyways to give me the medicine again.

Got up around 10 thouhg.

Now im here writing stuff.. 

I dont want to stay here (dads) til 7, but looks like i haveta.. :( oh well...

I really really wish AIM would work here. It doesnt because, um.. actually im not sure, but I think my uncle put a firewall on the comptuer, so it doesnt work..

Well.. guess thats all.. Talk to you later..

~Ashley~
http://ashleyannaka.livejournal.com/820.html

If you read my xanga, most of this will be the same as it, but you can read it anyway..

Went to the Beach with the CARE club today. Was fun! :)

Left WAIS around 8, arrived arond, i guess, 9:30. Got the papers and other stuff. WEnt to Jamaica Beach..

Walked along it looking for trash. Picked the stuff up.. After we were done we decided to walk along the beach in the water. Was fun. It was SOOOOO hot out thouhg, so the water was nice.

Went back and hung out by the car for awhile. Left after maybe 30 or so minutes of hanging out.

Went to this bay house that a former student has. Ate lunch and hung out there. 

Today was SOOO fun, I really had alot of fun, waaaaay more fun than ive had in a long time.. haha

And if you read my xanga and saw that i said my mom would be mad at me.
She wasnt, she didnt even mention it, so.. yeah.. its all good. :)

Anyways, so yeah today was good.. :)
HOpe you people had a great day too! :)
